messages.message: That would be great if we can do a UDF for now but we should be ingest. When I get to the airport I’ll start formalizing a doc and then tmrw in the office work with the team to figure out how we should write a JIRA ticket because I don’t know what team it should go to and how to have someone own it
`xlrd` is available on their instance, and it has the ability to navigate to different sheets
It will have to be in a UDF for now, but there is _some_ approach available today at least
awesome! yea, there’s starter code here for how to use `xlrd` to split sheets. if you’re in a pinch i can spend some time writing the udf

Happy to help this afternoon too, if you run out of time (although a sample representative spreadsheet would be helpful @Matt, especially one with tabs named similarly to how BAML has their sheets named)
I’ll make an example repo with a excel sheet with tabs if anyone could help out
They won’t send accross any data but here is an example
dont have access to this repo
also, can we please use https://www.instabase.com/ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase%20Drive/poc/ folders going forward? its already got all the right permissioning set up
and we can really use everyone’s cooperation in making that repo the central place for information about use cases, pocs, solutions we’ve seen as a company
